Context:
George Brown College has received permission from the Ministry of Colleges and Universities to amend their degree titles to include "Honours." This change is more aligned with other degree titles in respective fields and is a more accurate reflection of the nature of the program of study. To receive a new credential, students must return their degree in person to any Student Services area or by mail to the following address with the completed Credential Request form:

Office of the Registrar
Records Department
George Brown College
160 Kendal Avenue
P.O. Box 1015, Station B
Toronto, Ontario M5T 2T9

For inquiries, please contact the Records Department. To learn more about land acknowledgment, sign up for college news and updates, visit their social media hub or call 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Please note that the information contained in this website is subject to change without notice. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
